thread.section_title: Hotel Santa Costanza - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel, quite noisy.
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel, quite noisy. - Review of Hotel Santa Costanza, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: jacquig1986
title: Lovely hotel, quite noisy.
text:
I stayed here for three nights. Firstly I would say if you're coming from the Termini get the metro to Agnes not Bologna... you will have a hell of a walk from Bologna!
I arrived at 12 but check in was at 2 so left bags and went sight seeing. Came back and the room was ready. It had everything you need but being English I would have loved a kettle and tea facilities! The room had plenty of storage, a safe and a fridge! The bathroom was clean!
All the staff we spoke to were lovely.
The only downfall was how noisy it was! I think I was by the kitchen (room 122 on the ground floor)
All in all, clean and comfortable for what I wanted and I would definitely return!
